sequence.speaker: LUCIA
sequence.text: I want you to meet my brother Adel.

sequence.speaker: JIMSON
sequence.text: You seem like a hardy kid. At least you’re tall. Fancy a pitchfork, boy?

sequence.speaker: JIMSON
sequence.text: Did you know there are eleven kinds of pitchforks? I got ‘em all! One would go real well with that hat of yours.

responses.text: No. You’re already armed. I don’t need you in possession of any more sharp objects. Thanks Jimson, but we’ll be leaving now.
Oh no, how sad, so sorry Jimson, maybe next time.
